description: When you’re looking for the versatility of a hoodie that can be worn both as a standalone layer and a starting point, Smartwool's Men’s Merino Sport 150 Hoodie is the product for you. Made with Smartwool's Merino Sport 150 fabric, this hoodie is breathable, moves moisture, dries quickly, resists odors, and most importantly, is more comfortable than all of your other hoodies.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 Hoodie - Mens
